data.convo: If you are staying here for a few days , we ’ d be delighted to see you at our factory . It ’ s very kind of you to say so . My associate and I will be interested in visiting your factory . Let us know when you are free . We ’ ll arrange the tour for you . Thank you . I ’ ll give you a call this afternoon to set the time . There ’ s nothing like seeing things with one ’ s own eyes . That ’ s for sure . You ’ ll know our products better after the visit .
